attributes.action: Leave the EU with either a deal or no deal by the end of 2019
attributes.additional_details:
Back in 2016 a massive 33,577,342 people voted in the EU referendum and 51.89% of those voted to LEAVE and won the referendum. 
It has now been over 3 years since the referendum and still our government are arguing with each other about, when to leave, How to leave, Also setting new laws to stop a no deal exit.
In a game of football if the team that loses don't agree with the result, then it won't get replayed as the result is the result. 

THE SAME GOES WITH THE REFERENDUM, 51.89% OF THE UK VOTED SO LETS LEAVE, DEAL OR NO DEAL.
attributes.background: This petition has been set up to get our government to actually listen to the people who put them where they are and leave the EU as voted for in 2016 once and for all.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Rosie Winterton MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Doncaster Central
